common_filenames.description: [name_of_DBF_file].dbt - DBT files bear the same name as the DBF file that references them. For example, a DBF file name sample_database.dbf will reference the sample_database.dbt file.
[name_of_DBF_file].dbt - DBT files bear the same name as the DBF file that references them. For example, a DBF file name sample_database.dbf will reference the sample_database.dbt file.
